name: algebraicIndependent_iff
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_3
A : Type u_5
x : ι → A
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
⊢ Iff (AlgebraicIndependent R x) (∀ (p : MvPolynomial ι R), Eq ((MvPolynomial.aeval x) p) 0 → Eq p 0)
decl:
theorem algebraicIndependent_iff :
    AlgebraicIndependent R x ↔
      ∀ p : MvPolynomial ι R, MvPolynomial.aeval (x : ι → A) p = 0 → p = 0 :=
  injective_iff_map_eq_zero _

name: AlgebraicIndependent.eq_zero_of_aeval_eq_zero
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_3
A : Type u_5
x : ι → A
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
h : AlgebraicIndependent R x
p : MvPolynomial ι R
a✝ : Eq ((MvPolynomial.aeval x) p) 0
⊢ Eq p 0
decl:
theorem AlgebraicIndependent.eq_zero_of_aeval_eq_zero (h : AlgebraicIndependent R x) :
    ∀ p : MvPolynomial ι R, MvPolynomial.aeval (x : ι → A) p = 0 → p = 0 :=
  algebraicIndependent_iff.1 h

name: algebraicIndependent_iff_injective_aeval
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_3
A : Type u_5
x : ι → A
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
⊢ Iff (AlgebraicIndependent R x) (Function.Injective ⇑(MvPolynomial.aeval x))
decl:
theorem algebraicIndependent_iff_injective_aeval :
    AlgebraicIndependent R x ↔ Injective (MvPolynomial.aeval x : MvPolynomial ι R →ₐ[R] A) :=
  Iff.rfl

name: AlgebraicIndependent.of_comp
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_3
A : Type u_5
A' : Type u_6
x : ι → A
inst✝⁴ : CommRing R
inst✝³ : CommRing A
inst✝² : CommRing A'
inst✝¹ : Algebra R A
inst✝ : Algebra R A'
f : AlgHom R A A'
hfv : AlgebraicIndependent R (Function.comp (⇑f) x)
⊢ AlgebraicIndependent R x
decl:
theorem of_comp (f : A →ₐ[R] A') (hfv : AlgebraicIndependent R (f ∘ x)) :
    AlgebraicIndependent R x := by
  have : aeval (f ∘ x) = f.comp (aeval x) := by ext; simp
  rw [AlgebraicIndependent, this, AlgHom.coe_comp] at hfv
  exact hfv.of_comp

name: AlgebraicIndependent.comp
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
A : Type u_5
x : ι → A
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
hx : AlgebraicIndependent R x
f : ι' → ι
hf : Function.Injective f
⊢ AlgebraicIndependent R (Function.comp x f)
decl:
theorem comp (f : ι' → ι) (hf : Function.Injective f) : AlgebraicIndependent R (x ∘ f) := by
  intro p q
  simpa [aeval_rename, (rename_injective f hf).eq_iff] using @hx (rename f p) (rename f q)

name: AlgebraicIndependent.coe_range
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_3
A : Type u_5
x : ι → A
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
hx : AlgebraicIndependent R x
⊢ AlgebraicIndependent R Subtype.val
decl:
theorem coe_range : AlgebraicIndependent R ((↑) : range x → A) := by
  simpa using hx.comp _ (rangeSplitting_injective x)

name: algebraicIndependent_equiv
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
A : Type u_5
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
e : Equiv ι ι'
f : ι' → A
⊢ Iff (AlgebraicIndependent R (Function.comp f ⇑e)) (AlgebraicIndependent R f)
decl:
theorem algebraicIndependent_equiv (e : ι ≃ ι') {f : ι' → A} :
    AlgebraicIndependent R (f ∘ e) ↔ AlgebraicIndependent R f :=
  ⟨fun h => Function.comp_id f ▸ e.self_comp_symm ▸ h.comp _ e.symm.injective,
    fun h => h.comp _ e.injective⟩

name: algebraicIndependent_equiv'
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
A : Type u_5
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
e : Equiv ι ι'
f : ι' → A
g : ι → A
h : Eq (Function.comp f ⇑e) g
⊢ Iff (AlgebraicIndependent R g) (AlgebraicIndependent R f)
decl:
theorem algebraicIndependent_equiv' (e : ι ≃ ι') {f : ι' → A} {g : ι → A} (h : f ∘ e = g) :
    AlgebraicIndependent R g ↔ AlgebraicIndependent R f :=
  h ▸ algebraicIndependent_equiv e

name: algebraicIndependent_subtype_range
initialProofState:
R : Type u_3
A : Type u_5
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
ι : Type u_7
f : ι → A
hf : Function.Injective f
⊢ Iff (AlgebraicIndependent R Subtype.val) (AlgebraicIndependent R f)
decl:
theorem algebraicIndependent_subtype_range {ι} {f : ι → A} (hf : Injective f) :
    AlgebraicIndependent R ((↑) : range f → A) ↔ AlgebraicIndependent R f :=
  Iff.symm <| algebraicIndependent_equiv' (Equiv.ofInjective f hf) rfl

name: AlgebraicIndependent.of_subtype_range
initialProofState:
R : Type u_3
A : Type u_5
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
ι : Type u_7
f : ι → A
hf : Function.Injective f
a✝ : AlgebraicIndependent R Subtype.val
⊢ AlgebraicIndependent R f

name: algebraicIndependent_image
initialProofState:
R : Type u_3
A : Type u_5
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
ι : Type u_7
s : Set ι
f : ι → A
hf : Set.InjOn f s
⊢ Iff (AlgebraicIndependent R fun x => f ↑x) (AlgebraicIndependent R fun x => ↑x)
decl:
theorem algebraicIndependent_image {ι} {s : Set ι} {f : ι → A} (hf : Set.InjOn f s) :
    (AlgebraicIndependent R fun x : s => f x) ↔ AlgebraicIndependent R fun x : f '' s => (x : A) :=
  algebraicIndependent_equiv' (Equiv.Set.imageOfInjOn _ _ hf) rfl

name: AlgebraicIndependent.mono
initialProofState:
R : Type u_3
A : Type u_5
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
t s : Set A
h : HasSubset.Subset t s
hx : AlgebraicIndependent R Subtype.val
⊢ AlgebraicIndependent R Subtype.val
decl:
theorem mono {t s : Set A} (h : t ⊆ s)
    (hx : AlgebraicIndependent R ((↑) : s → A)) : AlgebraicIndependent R ((↑) : t → A) := by
  simpa [Function.comp] using hx.comp (inclusion h) (inclusion_injective h)

name: AlgebraicIndependent.aevalEquiv_apply_coe
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_3
A : Type u_5
x : ι → A
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
hx : AlgebraicIndependent R x
a✝ : MvPolynomial ι R
⊢ Eq (↑(hx.aevalEquiv a✝)) ((MvPolynomial.aeval x) a✝)
decl:
/-- Canonical isomorphism between polynomials and the subalgebra generated by
  algebraically independent elements. -/
@[simps! apply_coe]
def aevalEquiv : MvPolynomial ι R ≃ₐ[R] Algebra.adjoin R (range x) :=
  (AlgEquiv.ofInjective (aeval x) (algebraicIndependent_iff_injective_aeval.1 hx)).trans
    (Subalgebra.equivOfEq _ _ (Algebra.adjoin_range_eq_range_aeval R x).symm)

--@[simp] Porting note: removing simp because the linter complains about deterministic timeout

name: AlgebraicIndependent.algebraMap_aevalEquiv
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_3
A : Type u_5
x : ι → A
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
hx : AlgebraicIndependent R x
p : MvPolynomial ι R
⊢ Eq ((algebraMap (Subtype fun x_1 => Membership.mem (Algebra.adjoin R (Set.range x)) x_1) A) (hx.aevalEquiv p)) ((MvPolynomial.aeval x) p)
decl:
theorem algebraMap_aevalEquiv (p : MvPolynomial ι R) :
    algebraMap (Algebra.adjoin R (range x)) A (hx.aevalEquiv p) = aeval x p :=
  rfl

name: AlgebraicIndependent.aeval_repr
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_3
A : Type u_5
x : ι → A
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
hx : AlgebraicIndependent R x
p : Subtype fun x_1 => Membership.mem (Algebra.adjoin R (Set.range x)) x_1
⊢ Eq ((MvPolynomial.aeval x) (hx.repr p)) ↑p
decl:
@[simp]
theorem aeval_repr (p) : aeval x (hx.repr p) = p :=
  Subtype.ext_iff.1 (AlgEquiv.apply_symm_apply hx.aevalEquiv p)

name: AlgebraicIndependent.aeval_comp_repr
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
R : Type u_3
A : Type u_5
x : ι → A
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : CommRing A
inst✝ : Algebra R A
hx : AlgebraicIndependent R x
⊢ Eq ((MvPolynomial.aeval x).comp hx.repr) (Algebra.adjoin R (Set.range x)).val
decl:
theorem aeval_comp_repr : (aeval x).comp hx.repr = Subalgebra.val _ :=
  AlgHom.ext hx.aeval_repr
